price: (18) Enjoying what their Lord has given them, and their Lord protected them from the punishment of Hellfire.
arabic: فَٰكِهِينَ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ وَوَقَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ عَذَابَ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fākihīna bimā ātāhum rabbuhum wawaqāhum rabbuhum ʿadhāba al-jaḥīmi
